page.title: 09Industrial Estate Hollington
page.content: {Castleham Industrial Estate}was built on the site of Castleham Farm. It has about 50 factories at the moment (July 1985). Most of these have been built since 1980, when the roads were improved. 50 acres have been developed and there are plans for another 10 acres. It is a high quality commercial site.{Factories}include Aero Vintage, Computing Devices, Hellermann Deutsch (precision engineers),March Packaging. Some buildings have many small factory units in them, for people starting up. Some of the{buildings}are brick built, and have an attractive design; others are brightly coloured modern looking buildings. They are well spaced and planned, with grass and trees between. There are big car parks.The two Hastings newspapers, The Observer and The News have their offices here.
